gist.headline: Tuning the Engine
gist.blurb: Squashed some bugs in the API gateway and updated our test suites to keep things humming.
gist.summary: Fixed rate limit derivation logic, normalized API key permissions, and updated comprehensive test snapshots.
gist.impact: Improves backend reliability and provides clearer validation errors for API users.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot as a mechanic, tightening a bolt on a large pixelated gear representing the system internals.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot wearing a tiny mechanic's cap, adjusting a large pixelated gear. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SYSTEM CHECK'. Nostalgic and clean.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot wearing a tiny mechanic's cap, adjusting a large pixelated gear. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SYSTEM CHECK'. Nostalgic and clean.
